structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.history: Repealed Ky. Acts ch. 92, sec. 314, effective January 1, 2015. -- Amended 1985 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 4, sec. 2, effective July 19, 1985. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 40, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 159, sec. 1, effective March 29, 1976. -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 152, sec. 73. -- Amended 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 81, sec. 1. -- Amended 1944 Ky. Acts ch. 125, sec. 1. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. secs. 3493, 3629a.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Qualifications of members of police and fire departments.
